title: Why discussing cybersafety
learning_objectives: Students can define and explain what is cybersafety
Be able to list the most common online risks and understands the harm they can cause
Understand the importance of being safe, responsible, respectful online
main_messages: Cybersafety is important for the online user's mental&physical health
Anyone, even an expert online user can experience online risks
Acting safe and responsible online is as important as acting safe and responsible in real life
questions: List the online risks they know
Do they feel comfortable and safe with your online activities?

practical_examples.text: Give real statistics (time spent, ages of users, reported risks, etc.) for online activities and risks.
